entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT, Chetwynd
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:05 a.m. PDT Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 18. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of showers late this afternoon with risk of a thunderstorm. Widespread smoke. High 18. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers this evening. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Widespread smoke becoming local smoke this evening. Low 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 18.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Risk of thunderstorms near the Rockies late in the afternoon. Local smoke. High 18. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 7 May 2023
